response.overview: The 56-year-old locksmith Sándor lives in Pécs and runs a 24-hour emergency service to help those who lock themselves out. He works a lot, but earns little, and was forced to close his company as it became unable to cover all the required payments. Despite financial constraints, every day Sándor brings lunch to the homeless and others in need. But Sándor dreams of learning a new language and applying for a job abroad.
response.title: Ha nem segít a Mindenható
